de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.semwebclient.threadutils
Class TaskExecutorBase

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.semwebclient.threadutils.TaskExecutorBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DereferencerThread, URISearchThread
public abstract class TaskExecutorBase
extends Thread

A base class for threads that execute a specific type of tasks.

Author:
Olaf Hartig

Constructor Detail

TaskExecutorBase

protected TaskExecutorBase()
Method Detail

getTaskType

public abstract Class getTaskType()
Returns the type of the tasks executed by this kind of task execution threads.

executeTask

protected abstract void executeTask(Task task)
Executes the given task (which is guaranteed to be of the type specified by getTaskType()). Note for implementations: if this thread has already been stopped (cf. isStopped()) the execution must be stopped as quickly as possible.

hasTask

public final boolean hasTask()
Returns true if this thread is currently busy executing a task.

getTask

protected final Task getTask()
Returns the task currently executed by this thread.

isStopped

public final boolean isStopped()
Returns true if this thread has been stopped already.

startTask

public final void startTask(Task task)
Starts to execute the given task.

run

public final void run()

run in interface Runnable
Overrides:

stopThread

public final void stopThread()
Stops this thread. Sets the stop status of this thread and interrupts the execution.
